title: Space Transports.
wikitext:
'''Space Transports'''

'''''Time Taken''': ''One round or longer.

'''''Specializations''': ''Type or model transport — ''YT-1300 transport, Gallofree medium transport, Corellian Action VI transport.''

''Space transports ''is used to pilot all space transports: any non-combat starship, ranging from small light freighters (the ''Millennium Falcon ''is a highly modified YT-1300 light freighter) and scout ships to passenger liners, huge container ships and super transports. Transports may be starfighter- or capital-scale.

''Space transports ''can be used for a starship dodge — a "reaction skill" — to avoid enemy fire.
